availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Colonel Dee Warren (Taylor Co, Ky, sergeant)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, resident and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Jeremiah Warren and Mary "Polly" Warren. Resident of Taylor County in 1850. Student in Taylor County in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as corporal and sergeant from December 31, 1861, to March 11, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, Division 2, p. 147A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, p. 527.
